ground_truth.thought: 分析这些公司的产品创新和渠道扩展能力
ground_truth.name: ConsumerGoodsAnalytics.analyze_innovation_expansion

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'ConsumerGoodsAnalytics.get_market_share_data', 'description': 'Get market share and brand influence data for major consumer goods companies', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'List of company names or IDs'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'market_share', 'description': 'Market share data for each company'}, {'name': 'brand_influence', 'description': 'Brand influence metrics for each company'}]}]
我需要分析消费品行业的量化投资策略。首先，获取全球主要消费品公司的市场份额和品牌影响力数据。然后，分析这些公司的产品创新和渠道扩展能力。接着，获取消费品行业的消费者偏好和市场趋势数据。最后，基于这些信息，提出针对消费品行业的量化投资策略。
获取全球主要消费品公司的市场份额和品牌影响力数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'market_share': {'CompanyA': 15, 'CompanyB': 10, 'CompanyC': 8}, 'brand_influence': {'CompanyA': 'High', 'CompanyB': 'Medium', 'CompanyC': 'Low'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 当前这一步的目标是获取全球主要消费品公司的市场份额和品牌影响力数据。
